## TransactableProtocol.withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw DebtToken from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawDebtTokenFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish): Promise<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [ProtocolToken reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.protocoltokenreward.md)<!-- -->.
